thread.title: Sherri Ursini
thread.title_full: Home Zone Furniture reviewed by Sherri Ursini

author: Sherri Ursini
title: Sherri Ursini
text: My shopping experience was perfect. Stephanie was accommodating, clear, and attentive to my needs. She listened to what my needs were and didn't push or try to sell me something I didn't need or want. Thanks so much Stephanie. Also a shout out to her awesome store manager Erica. They were great!!
